meanings.definition: Of the highest quality or standard.
meanings.sent1: The topnotch cake was delicious and beautifully decorated.
meanings.sent2: She always delivers topnotch performances in her plays.
meanings.sent3: The topnotch chef accidentally added too much salt to the dish, making it inedible.
meanings.sent4: His topnotch skills on the basketball court make him stand out from the rest of the players.
meanings.sent5: The topnotch sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues of orange and pink.

meanings.sent1: We had a topnotch time at the amusement park, going on all the rides.
meanings.sent2: The hotel provided topnotch service, making our stay very enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The topnotch magician amazed the audience with his disappearing act.
meanings.sent4: Her topnotch singing voice captivated everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The topnotch student aced every exam without breaking a sweat.
